title: Getting Started with Next.js
content: Next.js has quickly established itself as a go-to framework for building modern, performant, and SEO-friendly web applications. While its core features provide a solid foundation, Next.js offers several advanced techniques that empower developers to create more sophisticated and efficient applications. In this blog post, we'll delve into some of these advanced Next.js techniques that can elevate your web development game....
